model.info: The MistralAI model to use for generating embeddings.

mistral_api_key.info: API key for authenticating with MistralAI.

max_concurrent_requests.info: Maximum number of concurrent requests to the API.

max_retries.info: Maximum number of retries for failed requests.

timeout.info: Timeout for API requests in seconds.

endpoint.info: The API endpoint URL for MistralAI.
